overview:
Out-of-box thinker possessing broad understanding of business and operational issues, from warehouse to boardroom, with respect to strong financial performance and use of necessary business success drivers. Expert communicator and mentor comfortable working with key executives, staff members and customers; consistently fosters standards of excellence through continued â€œleadership by exampleâ€ approach.. Believe strongly in employing professionalism, honesty and integrity at all times, with reputation for significant contributions to company success, growth and positive corporate culture. Specialties

Progression throughout career through ability to fuel revenue growth, develop profitable ideas and manage costs for both startup and traditional corporate environments. Strong skills in strategic planning, business development, financial management, team building, problem solving and operational improvement. Ability to lead numerous operational functions including IT infrastructure development, technical sales, finance, business development, financial management, marketing and customer service.
